mapper.select: SELECT BIG_CATEGORY, VALUE from KTO.CODE where CODE_TYPE = 0 and MID_CATEGORY=0 and SML_CATEGORY=0 order by VALUE

select BIG_CATEGORY, MID_CATEGORY, VALUE from KTO.CODE where BIG_CATEGORY in (select BIG_CATEGORY from KTO.CODE where CODE_TYPE=0 and SML_CATEGORY = 0 and MID_CATEGORY=0) and SML_CATEGORY = 0 and VALUE != '' and CODE_TYPE = 0 order by MID_CATEGORY *1 ,value, BIG_CATEGORY, SML_CATEGORY ASC
